sentence: (RTTNews) - Salesforce.com Inc (CRM) revealed earnings for first quarter that dropped from last year.
The company's bottom line came in at $99 million, or $0.11 per share.
This compares with $392 million, or $0.49 per share, in last year's first quarter.
Excluding items, Salesforce.com Inc reported adjusted earnings of $641 million or $0.70 per share for the period.
Analysts had expected the company to earn $0.69 per share, according to figures compiled by Thomson Reuters.
Analysts' estimates typically exclude special items.
The company's revenue for the quarter rose 30.2% to $4.87 billion from $3.74 billion last year.
-Analysts Estimate: $0.69 -Revenue (Q1): $4.87 Bln vs. $3.74 Bln last year.
